content: I agree with you. finding a balance between the growth of the tech industry and the needs of other businesses in the area is crucial for the overall economic health and prosperity of silicon valley. it requires a collaborative effort between industries, government, and community stakeholders to create solutions that address the challenges of rising real estate prices, infrastructure, and workforce development. with the right investments in infrastructure, affordable housing, and other solutions, it is possible to create a thriving and inclusive economy that benefits all industries and residents in silicon valley.
